extendedInfo.description: As the leading tourism publisher in Vietnam, City Passâs goal is to help visitors have the best holiday possible. Created by local tourism experts with more than 20 years of experience, we offer you the best of Vietnam. Our guidebooks cover 27 destinations, have a circulation of 200,000 and are distributed by a network of over 500 retail and hospitality partners throughout Vietnam.This City Pass app is Vietnamâs first premium travel guide of its kind, a unique combination of detailed information, unique local insight, stunning photography and innovative design at your fingertips. Let City Pass guide assist you in creating your own ad hoc itinerary and ensure you donât miss anything from historical landmarks or natural wonders or the perfect get away to some of Vietnamâs most beautiful beach resorts.Now available for major destinations such as Ho Chi Minh City, Vung Tau, Phan Thiet, Nha Trang, Da Nang, Hoi An, Hue, Hanoi and Halong Bay the new updated app includes:    Updates with new data instantly â key in where you are, set up your itinerary by using our interactive maps. Identify all the activities and attractions you can do within a range of distances    Attractions â all the main draw cards but some that only locals know    Shopping â the best places for souvenirs, arts and local markets plus major shopping streets and malls    Food â search by cuisine to find the best local and international restaurants    Drink â where to start in the morning â and end up late at night    Accommodation - 5 star, 4 and 3 star hotels to serviced apartments    Activities â Karaoke, spas, gaming, golf, and wilder adventures    Practicalities â all you need to know to survive in the jungle that is urban Vietnam    Video â 33 original videos to inspire and instruct you about the country    Gallery â more than 1000 photographs and updated daily

reviews.title: Slow and few info
reviews.comment: Bad design, slow work, need to enter personal info to use map, landscape mode in my phone... and places which show are not cheap, not for usual turists
reviews.author: Ekaterina Polkanova

reviews.title: Simply awesome
reviews.comment: Use this app if you live in or want to visit. Works great and easy to use, the maps are the best!
reviews.author: justin colebrissi

reviews.title: A nice travel app.
reviews.comment: Recommend this app for anyone coming top Vietnam.
reviews.author: stefan georg

reviews.title: Yataaa !!!!
reviews.comment: Finally a GR-EA-T App for tourists AND residents in Nam\' !!! I rarely used to get an App built like this one... Focused on user exprience and efficiency ! Next improve ??? Maybe design of Home Page & still more content ? But really, forget your 20\342\202\254-lonely-f****** planet and get this... Much more useful than A \"I will do what all people do and get a  A must-have !

reviews.title: dynamic data
reviews.comment: it\'s awesome with the updates button, new restaurants or places appear in the app! So nice in overall
reviews.author: Thuy Pham Thi Thanh

reviews.title: It\'s Extremely Great with Exclusive Offline Map!
reviews.comment: Great guide for tourist since it suggests many restaurant, coffee shops, hotels or other places of interest etc. near your current location (using GPS), and especially it shows direction for you to get to those places, too!  Such a wonderful app!
reviews.author: Hoang Thinh Vo
